## DatabaseMonitor interface

Database monitor instance associated with a specific database connection and therefore a specific database transaction.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface DatabaseMonitor 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [release()](./db.databasemonitor.release.md) | Release the instance back to the provider after it is no longer needed. |
